deductions.formula:
150 if marital_status=='Single'
else 200 if marital_status=='Married' and custom_number_of_children==0 else 200 + (25*custom_number_of_children) if custom_number_of_children != 0
else 0
basic + housing + performance_social + leadership + supervisory + risk_social + taxable_bonus + taxable_bonus_difference
basic + family + housing + performance_tax + leadership + supervisory + risk_social + taxable_bonus_difference + taxable_bonus

salary_difference_deduction + guaranteed_share + solidarity_fund + jihad + income + fund_deductions + company_loan + transport_deduction + ownership_installment + fund_loan + financial_obligation + loan + expense_deduction + care_loan + others_benefit + other_deductions + absence_deduction + rest_deduction + cash_deduction + deduction

earnings.formula: (basic + family + housing + transport + leadership + supervisory ) * performance_factor + performance_difference

basic + family + housing + transport + performance + leadership + supervisory + risk + card_allowance + fuel_allowance + taxable_bonus + bonus + subsistence_allowance + healthcare + goods_support + non_taxable_difference + leave_allowance + lodging + absence_deduction + extra + cash_extra
